title: Audio Problem
body: I noticed what was causing my FPS drop. Whenever i play with my headphones connected to the PC, the games starts lagging badly. Whenever i play without my headphones connected, the game runs fine. Please help me find the solution to this. Thank You

replies.body: Hmmmm that might be happening if your pc is trying to install some drivers for those headphones or something like that. Do you happen to be running League on a relatively older pc?
Well, i have no idea if my drivers are up to date. But its not physically old. I have specs that are higher than the recommended specs to run leauge. I run the game at 120 FPS
I went ahead and spoke with some of my tech guys about this again and they had one very important question to see what might be going on: are you using a usb plugin for these headphones?
Yes i am, the headphones are wireless and usb stick is what i use.

Alrighty, that could actually be the main issue here after talking this over with my tech bros. Essentially 2 things might be going wrong. Either that usb device to simply taking some processing power away from your pc causing these issues, which might not be easily fixed if your pc simply can't handle it.

On the flip side, one small note a lot of us tend to forget. Your pc does have sound drivers as well. Do me a favor and check for any *sound* card AND *graphics* card driver updates. Test that in a custom game after updating and hit me back up with the results!
